mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to Hon. George M. Palmer on Behalf of the Prince Edward Council on Human Relations
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Typewritten letter to Hon. George M. Palmer from Marvin W. Schlegel, President Prince Edward Council on Human Relations. May 20, 1965 / The letter asks for the Senator's help in obtaining support from the school board in Project Headstart / Individuals referenced: Mr. Mellwaine, Arthur M. Field, Jr., Mrs. Graves H. Thompson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Marvin W. Schlegel
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Race Relations
Civil Rights Movements--United States
School Integration--Massive Resistance Movement--Southern States
Prince Edward County Free School Association (Va.)
Prince Edward County (Va.)
